author: veithen
msg: AXIS2-4819: Removed the static fields from DataLocatorFactory and create a new AxisDataLocator instance each time. Reason: AxisDataLocator implementations are stateful and therefore not thread safe.

author: adrianc
msg: Removed some unnecessary converters. Those conversions were already handled with generic converters.
